text: is a Japanese town in Saga on the island of Kyushu.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2005). "Arita" in Japan Encyclopedia, p. 46. The town is best known for making porcelain and other ceramics.Nussbaum, "Arita-yaki" at p. 46. ==Geography== Arita is in the western part of Saga Prefecture.
